metadata.title: CVE-2022-2498 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in pipeline subscriptions in GitLab EE affecting all versions from12.8 prior to 15.0.5, 15.1 prior to 15.1.4, and 15.2 prior to 15.2.1triggered new pipelines with the person who created the tag as the pipelinecreator instead of the subscription's author.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
